p.span: Thank you for contacting us earlier today.

As we discussed, I wanted to provide you with access to the documentation related to the PrimusGFS audit. You can find the documents by following the link below. Please navigate past the Addendums section and focus on the General Regulations, Questions & Expectations, and Interpretation Guidelines. For a Cooler/Cooler Cold Storage operation, please note that you will need to undergo audits for Module 1: Food Safety Management System, Module 5: Facility, and Module 6: HACCP. Module 7: Preventive Control is optional.

For your convenience, I'm also sharing a link to our
Toolkit , which can be a valuable resource for creating SOPs, logs, forms, and more.

When you're ready to schedule either a Pre-Assessment audit or a regular audit, please complete the attached application form. Additionally, please provide a HACCP flow chart illustrating the product's journey from receipt at your facility to its departure.
Lastly, I have included a quote for your reference. Should you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
Kind regards,
